data.name: Seasonal Cotton Loan
data.description: Short term finance to help you manage your cash flow during the cotton growing season's peak input periods.

features.additionalInfo: Freedom to pay down debt in good times with no penalties if you repay your variable rate loan early.
Choice of phone, online banking and mobile banking.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Rabobank rural banking products are designed for farm businesses.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Dishonour fees are charged in addition to the excess interest charge that may apply for overdrawing an account.

fees.name: Temporary Limit Increase Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a temporary increase in a Loan Limit is allowed.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on acceptance of a Letter of Offer and non-refundable.

fees.name: Loan Limit Increase Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a Loan Limit is increased, other than a Temporary Limit Increase.

fees.name: Legal Fees
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost legal fees incurred by the Bank relating to a Loan or securities

fees.name: Registration Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Relating to securities for a Loan.

fees.name: Disbursements
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost fees in connection with documentation preparation and administration.

fees.name: Search Fees
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost fee including title and company searches.

fees.name: Document Handling Fee (per document)
fees.additionalInfo: Where the Bank reviews a dealing affecting a security.
